name: Your  x has applied for a conditional order (joint)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

Your ((partner)) has applied for a conditional order. You also have to apply because you are doing a joint application. 

You have until ((application for CO date plus 14 days)) to apply. If you do not apply then your ((partner)) will be told what they can do to move the application forwards. 

Apply for a conditional order by signing  into your HMCTS account: ((signin url)) 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Your ((partner)) has applied for a conditional order ((isDivorce??for divorce))((isDissolution??to end your civil partnership))
